name: black-box-root
description: Root package for Black Box project

scripts.build:all: npm run build:admin && npm run build:vm001 && npm run build:vm002
scripts.start:all: npm run build:all && npm run start:backend & node server.js
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm --prefix ./Backend run dev" "npm --prefix ./Admin run dev" "npm --prefix ./VM-001 run dev" "npm --prefix ./VM-002 run dev"
